thread.title: Koch Groups Move On From Health-Care Fight

author: Julie Bykowicz
title: Koch Groups Move On From Health-Care Fight
text:
INDIAN WELLS, Calif.—The billionaire Koch brothers’ political organization spent more than $200 million in the past decade on what official Tim Phillips calls “without question our biggest policy defeat,” the quest to kill the Affordable Care Act.
Now, the network of donors is turning its attention to the more urgent matter of protecting Republican majorities in both chambers of Congress this fall.
“You...
